separates.from sentence: In this paper , we present a method for diverse generation that separates diversification and generation stages .

diversification stage.from sentence: The diversification stage leverages content selection to map the source to multiple sequences , where each mapping is modeled by focusing on different tokens in the source ( oneto - many mapping ) .

standard encoder - decoder model.generate: target sequence given each selected content from the source

generation stage.from sentence: The generation stage uses a standard encoder - decoder model to generate a target sequence given each selected content from the source ( one - to - one mapping ) .

present.from sentence:
We present a generic module called SELECTOR that is specialized for diversification .
This module can be used as a plug - and - play to an arbitrary encoder - decoder model for generation without architecture change .
